name: FQuantizedPumpIndicatorData
comment: Struct containing quantized fluid content for a more optimized replication.

properties.name: PackedFlow
properties.comment: See setters for how this data is packed.

name: AFGBuildablePipelinePump
comment: Base class for all attachable pipeline pumps.

methods.name: SetMaxHeadLift
methods.comment: Set the maximum out pressure for this pump.

methods.name: GetMaxHeadLift
methods.comment: Get the absolute maximum amount of meters up this pump can push fluid.

methods.name: GetDesignHeadLift
methods.comment: Get the amount of meters up this pump is designed to push fluid.

methods.name: SetFlowLimit
methods.comment:
@todoPipes Setting a limit does not work on client right now, if we want that make it work. (For the check valves later)
Set the maximum flow rate through this pump. [m3/s]

methods.name: GetFlowLimit
methods.comment: Get the set maximum flow rate through this pump. [m3/s]

methods.name: GetIndicatorFlowPct
methods.comment: Get the replicated flow rate through this pump from 0 to MAX in the range. [0,1]

methods.name: GetIndicatorFlow
methods.comment: Get the replicated flow rate through this pump. [m^3/s]

methods.name: GetIndicatorHeadLiftPct
methods.comment: Get the replicated head lift in percent of the max. [0,1]

methods.name: GetIndicatorHeadLift
methods.comment: Get the current head lift this pump is pushing, this can be seen as the height of the water pushing back on the pump. [meters]

properties.name: mDesignPressure
properties.comment: When the pump is working above this pressure, it's working outside of it's specifications, range [0, max pressure), unit [meters]

properties.name: mFlowLimit
properties.comment: Maximum flow rate of this pump. [m3/s]

properties.name: mMinimumFlowPercentForStandby
properties.comment: Minimum Flow percent acceptable before entering StandBy mode on indicator

properties.name: mIndicatorData
properties.comment: Quantized data used by the indicators.

properties.name: mIndicatorFlowPct
properties.comment: Smoothed values used by the indicators/UI.
